Entries.winter_15_2: @, I got a five percent raise this year! Biggest one they've ever given me!$h

Entries.6_2: Why is it every time I have to work with a Java team, they've done something weird with their architecture?$a
Entries.8_2: Hey @, have you ever played {{i18n:video.game.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 09}} }}? It's so good, isn't it?
Entries.9_2: The word 'trie' really doesn't look like a word anymore.#$b#Not that it...really ever looked like a word in the first place.
Entries.10_2: Apparently Mayor Lewis wants to start a square dance club? What decade does he live in, the fifties?
Entries.11_2: Heya @, you wanna go see {{i18n:action.movie.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 09}} }} with me and Sam some day?

Entries.3_2: Did you hear of the story of the printer that wouldn't print on Tuesdays?#$b#Man, there's always interesting bugs in the world.
Entries.4_2: Why is everyone obsessed over functional programming languages?
Entries.10_2: All my coworkers are like, have you heard of this new programming language? It has so much more static analysis, apparently.#$b#Frankly, I'm tired of hearing about it.
Entries.12_2: Twenty-four commits, a hundred thousand lines added, fifty thousand lines removed, god I hate this place.

Entries.8_2: Did you see the story about the guy who couldn't send an email with a distance greater than 500 miles? That one was amusing.$h
